title: Major Scale
description: Practice playing the major scale in all positions across the fretboard. Focus on clean notes and smooth transitions.

title: Pentatonic Scale
description: Learn the minor pentatonic scale patterns. Essential for improvisation and soloing.

title: Chromatic Exercises
description: Finger independence and dexterity exercises using chromatic patterns.

title: Barre Chords
description: Master moveable barre chord shapes (E and A forms). Essential for playing up the neck.

title: Alternate Picking
description: Develop speed and accuracy with alternate picking technique. Start slow and build up.

title: String Skipping
description: Practice jumping between non-adjacent strings cleanly and accurately.
